item.title: Javascript Core Language
item.description: Javascript: Getting Started 1. Introduction to Javascript On managing packages. User npm install in the command line - this will check through the packages.json file and install any dependencies listed there. In this case the package lite-server is installed. npm is a package manager for Node.js environment. Iâ€™ll need to look into this CTRL+` in vscode brings up the terminal For safety reasons, or some such thing, always run npm install on the command prompt, outside of vscode - never using the terminal in the editor Use npm run start which starts up lite server.
